cidrBlock.description: The CIDR block to match. This must be a valid network mask.

icmpCode.description: The ICMP type code to be used. Default 0.

icmpType.description: The ICMP type to be used. Default 0.

ipv6CidrBlock.description:
The IPv6 CIDR block.

> For more information on ICMP types and codes, see [Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) Parameters](https://www.iana.org/assignments/icmp-parameters/icmp-parameters.xhtml).

protocol.description: The protocol to match. If using the -1 'all' protocol, you must specify a from and to port of 0.

ruleNo.description: The rule number. Used for ordering.

toPort.description:
The to port to match.

The following arguments are optional:
